title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 - Jul 28 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 - Jul 28 2022
description:
Covid hospitalization rate in NYC soars 70% in month, ICU patient tally nearly doubles and highs in reinfection rates. Biden looking to trade "Lord of War" arms dealer for WNBA prisoner. Covid ain't over until Fauci resigns. Another brutal NYC attack on the L train. Kari Lake, Trump-endorsed Arizona gubernatorial candidate, joins Buck to discuss Biden's failure at the southern border, her Day One plan to secure the border if elected, and Arizona election integrity. Clay calls in from the 15th hole at LIV golf tournament at the Trump National Golf Club Bedminster.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
